price: Âyetlerimizi yalanlayan ve kendilerine zulmetmiş olan kavmin durumu ne kötüdür!
arabic: سَآءَ مَثَلًا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَأَنفُسَهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: sāa mathalan al-qawmu alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā wa-anfusahum kānū yaẓlimūna
